article_title: You Could Save Hundreds Of Dollars On These Four Surgeries

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: U.S. consumers who shopped for four different medical procedures would’ve saved between $320 and $1,062 in out-of-pocket costs if they chose an outpatient facility over a hospital, according to a new analysis. The Blue Cross and Blue Shield Association, which is releasing a series of studies documenting variances in the cost [...]
